root: ^I am taking a test for Science class and am trying to figure out this question.
^What is the largest planet in our galaxy?

res1: ^Jupiter is the right answer! And %FullName:NPC:2% mentions that %Pron:2:1% checked my test for the answer and is thankful I got it right.

^Not only did I pick the right answer of Jupiter but %FullName:NPC:2% mentions that %Pron:2:1% checked what I wrote for my answer and is glad I got it right since I ended up helping %Pron:2:2% out. Didn't even realize I was helping... but happy to help!
res2: ^Saturn is the wrong answer. Oh well, I knew it was one of the biggest and has a whole bunch of rings. I figured it was a good guess.
res3: ^Mercury is the wrong answer. I also later find out that it is one of the smaller planets... so that wasn't even a good guess. Whoops!
res4: ^Pluto is the wrong answer and is, in fact, wrong for more reasons than one!

^My teacher %FullName:NPC:1% informs me in front of the whole class that Pluto is very small and also isn't even considered a planet anymore, so this was a really bad choice! I am embarrassed but %FullName:NPC:2% comforts me and makes me feel better about the fact that I only got one stupid question wrong.
global decl: ^What is the largest planet in our galaxy?
